title: Construction of a new building to improve infrastructure facilities at the Faculty of Applied Science, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
decision_details: ? the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, on the recommendation of the Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (CAPC) and the Technical Evaluation Committee (TEC) to award the contract for the construction of a new building for the above purpose at a cost of Rs.106,239,367.50, was approved by the Cabinet.
